wiki.content:
"Home" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Adult Contemporary Chart in the Summer of 2005.

wiki.summary: "Home" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Adult Contemporary Chart in the Summer of 2005.
